Source.Name: dump_syms
Source.Summary: Rewrite of breakpad dump_syms tools in Rust
Source.Description: dump_syms is a command-line utility for parsing the debugging information the compiler provides (whether as DWARF or STABS sections in an ELF file or as stand-alone PDB files) and writing that information back out in the Breakpad symbol file format.

Package.Name: dump_syms
Package.Summary: Rewrite of breakpad dump_syms tools in Rust
Package.Description: dump_syms is a command-line utility for parsing the debugging information the compiler provides (whether as DWARF or STABS sections in an ELF file or as stand-alone PDB files) and writing that information back out in the Breakpad symbol file format.
